snippet: The Chevrolet Malibu is Detroit’s gray-flannel answer to the Toyota Camry. The Chevy enters the scrum of its midsize competitors, offering its usual pleasantries, but not making the strongest impression.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of 2013 Chevrolet Malibu.
lead_paragraph: The Chevrolet Malibu is Detroit’s gray-flannel answer to the Toyota Camry. The Chevy enters the scrum of its midsize competitors, offering its usual pleasantries, but not making the strongest impression.
